name: LaciaOS Chamber | BIG Update 1.7
description:
THIS IS A SIMULATOR! THIS IS NOT A REAL OPERATING SYSTEM!

A very big update for LaciaOS Chamber has been released!

In it you will see:

1.Added Japanese and Chinese languages.

2.Added games and XBOX gamepad support.

3. Fixed a large and significant number of bugs.

4.The computer icon has been changed.

5.Added a folder with drivers.

6.Changed sounds.

7.The built-in browser has been removed, now you can change the user's avatar instead, which will be displayed in the "Exit" menu.

8.The update installation menu has been added.

9.The logo has been changed.

10.Changing the hitboxes of the buttons.

Have a happy game!
